name: One Night At Truffaut's
description:
You work at Truffaut's Meat Production Inc. and you've just received a call from your boss about the old animatronics having moved overnight. You've been sent to watch them at the nightshift. Any property damage will result in your firing.

This is a silly fnaf type game. oh and by the way: W to block the door. S to hide under desk. Space to enter cams. Press the corresponding keys to change cameras.

lmao sorry should have put instructions in game

oh and this too

Truffaut The Tank Wallaby

If you hear his laugh you have to watch him on the cameras or he will get in.

Bingo The Flamboyant Buoyant Capybara

Comes to the door and smashes through. Block the door to keep them out. Loves the spotlight, if someone else is at your door or window, bingo will wait.

Gerald the Viking Ibex

Listen for running. Once you see them in the window you have to hide under the desk quickly.

Chain the Stoner Puffin

If you hear her sensor do not move.

sorry again :(

also btw no jumpscares! just slightly loud sounds!
also you have to reload the page every time you die :'D
